oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Civil War era currency issued by city of Richmond, Va.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This item is a $0.75 bond coupon or scrip money from the State of Virginia, City of Richmond. The city promises to "pay to bearer on demand seventy-five cents, When presented in sums of one or more dollars. And this Note is receivable for any dues to the City of Richmond.
